item.title: Four trade proposals for Young: What could Atlanta get for the star guard?
item.description: Trae Young could become the NBA trade season's first domino. Let's help the Hawks find the best move for him.

item.title: A sandwich with split loyalties? Peach Bowl concessions include brisket item honoring Oregon, Indiana
item.description: Indiana and Oregon fans at the Peach Bowl Friday can try Mercedes-Benz Stadium's new 2-foot dueling brisket sandwich, which pays homage to both school...

item.title: Sources: Hawks' Young prefers trade to Wizards
item.description: Hawks star Trae Young has the Washington Wizards as his preferred destination as player and his current team work together on a possible trade, source...

item.title: Sources: Cubs, Marlins close to Cabrera trade
item.description: The Cubs are finalizing a trade to acquire pitcher Edward Cabrera from the Marlins, sources confirmed to ESPN.

item.title: Saints committed to Shough as starting QB in '26
item.description: The Saints are preparing to move ahead with Tyler Shough as their starting quarterback in 2026.
